name: Crystal Caverns (itch) (Game Dev Debbie)
description:
A mystical treasure hunt of beautiful crystals.

How to Play

Your goal is to pick up as many gems as you can before time runs out.

*Sound Included

Controls

Arrow Keys or W-A-S-D for movement

Credits

"Translucent Crystals" by SineVFX

"Small Cave Kit" by Wonder Games

"FREE Casual Game SFX Pack" by Dustyroom

Models and animation from Mixamo.com

Background music by LightspeedLife

Jam Information

Weekly Game Jam - Week 169, Theme:  Treasure Hunt
